actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 620 of title 38, United States Code, to extend the length of time community nursing home care may be provided at the expense of the United States.

summary.text: Extends the length of time community nursing home care may be provided to a veteran at the expense of the United States from 6 months to 9 months after he has been transferred from a VA hospital. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 620(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 620 of title 38, United States Code, to extend the length of time community nursing home care may be provided at the expense of the United States.
